Overview

He's not bigger. He's not faster. He's not meaner. So he'd better be smarter.Storm is born into a world of secrets - an island no one visits, names no one will say, and deaths that no one will talk about. The answers are locked in his species' troubled past, guarded by the fierce creasia cats. ...[Google Books](https://books.google.com/books/about/Hunters_Unlucky.html?id=8-aWoAEACAAJ&source=kp_book_description)
